subject: Soccer
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: As the M.L.S. All-Stars prepare to face Manchester United on Wednesday night, the Red Devils have beaten three M.L.S. teams this month by a combined score of 14-2.
snippet: As the M.L.S. All-Stars prepare to face Manchester United on Wednesday night, the Red Devils have beaten three M.L.S. teams this month by a combined score of 14-2.
